item.title: 美国经济因消费疲软和贸易影响加大而萎缩 0.2
item.description: 美国经济在今年年初出现萎缩，原因是消费支出疲软，进口甚至比最初报告的还要多。【原文：The US economy shrank at the start of the year, restrained by weaker consumer spending and even more imports than initially reported.】

item.title: DeepSeek 称升级版模型推理能力更强，幻觉更少
item.description: 中国初创公司 DeepSeek 周四表示，其升级版人工智能模型在数学、编程和一般逻辑方面的表现优于前一版本，同时产生幻觉的情况也有所减少。【原文：The Chinese startup DeepSeek said Thursday that its upgraded artificial-intelligence model can perform mathematics, programming, and general logic better than the previous version, while hallucinating less.】

item.title: 花旗的弗雷泽说，特朗普的明确表态将释放 IPO 市场的活力
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. ）仍然希望，一旦企业和商界领袖对特朗普政府的政策有了更清晰的认识，期待已久的投资银行市场转机就会出现，但这可能要等到明年。【原文：Citigroup Inc. remains hopeful that the long-awaited turnaround in investment-banking markets will begin as soon as corporations and business leaders get more clarity on Trump administration policy, but that might have to wait until next year.】

item.title: 南非拉马福萨成立小组调查种族隔离罪行
item.description: 南非总统西里尔-拉马福萨（Cyril Ramaphosa）签署了一份公告，宣布成立一个司法调查委员会，以确定是否有人试图阻止对种族隔离时期的罪行进行调查和起诉。【原文：South African President Cyril Ramaphosa has signed a proclamation to establish a judicial commission of inquiry to determine whether attempts were made to prevent the investigation and prosecution of apartheid-era crimes.】

item.title: 食品价格回落，赞比亚通胀降至 11 个月低点
item.description: 赞比亚的年通货膨胀率在 5 月份降至 11 个月以来的最低点，原因是降雨量的增加帮助抑制了玉米粉和蔬菜价格的上涨。【原文：Zambia’s annual inflation rate eased to an 11-month low in May as improved rains helped cool price rises of corn meal and vegetables.】
